SELECT type, SUM(number) as totalSale FROM book LEFT JOIN book_type ON book.id = book_type.bookId LEFT JOIN type ON book_type.typeId = type.id LEFT JOIN orders ON book.id = orders.bookId WHERE type IS NOT NULL GROUP BY type

SELECT m.MONTH, COUNT( orders_show.payTime ) AS ordersNumber FROM ( SELECT 1 AS MONTH UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6 UNION SELECT 7 UNION SELECT 8 UNION SELECT 9 UNION SELECT 10 UNION SELECT 11 UNION SELECT 12 ) m LEFT JOIN orders_show ON EXTRACT( MONTH FROM orders_show.payTime ) = m.MONTH GROUP BY m.MONTH ORDER BY m.MONTH;
